Uses of Class
org.loboevolution.apache.xpath.patterns.StepPattern

Packages that use StepPattern
Package
Description
org.loboevolution.apache.xpath.compiler
Implements an XPath parser which produces an OpMap, and a so-called Compiler which produces an expression tree for fast evaluation.
org.loboevolution.apache.xpath.patterns
Implementation of XPath nodeTest support, and XSLT pattern matching support.
